newsitem.title: USA: Gunman shoots three at Oregon Scientology office.
newsitem.headline: Gunman shoots three at Oregon Scientology office.

text.p: A gunman shot and wounded three people in a Church of Scientology office Wednesday and then started a fire before police arrested him, officials said.
Two men and one woman were admitted to Oregon Health Sciences University Hospital. Officials did not immediately know their condition.
Police spokesman Lt. Cliff Madison said the gunman walked into the street-level church office in downtown Portland and shot the receptionist and two other people.
